title: New: Lolo – Heard It From A Friend
content:
Don’t get on the wrong side of Lauren Pritchard.

Revamping her ‘good girl’ image, the twenty five year old former soul singer has adopted a grittier approach, whilst maintaining the stunning vocals that helped her shoot to fame. You can imagine her storming into a room at a house party, half weeping, half yelling new single Heard It From A Friend in the direction of a cheating boyfriend. Raw, cutting and deliriously energetic, having already clocked up an impressive 100,000 plays of her debut track (Weapon For Saturday), and featured on the recent Panic At The Disco single, Lolo’s future is looking extremely bright.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
